org.forgerock.openam.authentication.service.protocol

Class RemoteHttpServletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.service.protocol.RemoteServletResponse
      • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.service.protocol.RemoteHttpServletResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse

    public class RemoteHttpServletResponse
extends RemoteServletResponse
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, Serializable
    Encapsulates a HttpServletResponse and makes that state that is serializable transferable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
